text: the automerge name similarity check has been in place for ~4 months now; any feedback or changes we should make? the initial cutoffs were fairly arbitrary, do they seem too high or low? is the messaging clear in the comment?

elements.text: the automerge name similarity check has been in place for ~4 months now; any feedback or changes we should make? the initial cutoffs were fairly arbitrary, do they seem too high or low? is the messaging clear in the comment?

text: The feature I really want is for AutoMerge to see that the "AutoMerge name similarity is fine" label is applied, and then auto merge the PR after 3 days IF the only failing check was the name similarity
